data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Insight: Tools of Practice
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

This is an extension of the 'How to Study Better' Tutorial. This tutorial will guide you to have routine driven goals and show you the power of trial and error. This product contains a total of 60 minutes of videos and PSD files.
data.about_the_game: This is an extension of the 'How to Study Better' Tutorial. This tutorial will guide you to have routine driven goals and show you the power of trial and error. This product contains a total of 60 minutes of videos and PSD files.
data.short_description: This is an extension of the 'How to Study Better' Tutorial.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
